_comment: THIS IS AN EXAMPLE OF A POOR REVIEW. Do not use this as a template for your output.
_problems: Verdict says 'approve' but there are error-severity findings — inconsistent
Findings are vague ('could be better', 'seems wrong') — not actionable
No line numbers — reviewer can't locate the issues
Summary was clearly written first and findings backfilled
Divergence score is 0.0 despite having findings — dishonest metric
Missing dimension assessment — which review dimensions were actually checked?

findings.description: Some of the error handling could be better.
A few variable names seem wrong.

summary: The code looks good overall. There are some minor issues with error handling and naming but nothing major. Approved.
